detail_desc: Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and a small appliqué at the bottom.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with narrow hems.

Tunic in crisp cotton poplin with a collar and V-neck opening at the front. Dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam under the bust and at the hem for added width.

Shirt in a checked cotton weave with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short cotton twill skirt with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and visible seams front and back.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Sock boots with round toes, a zip at the top and covered heels. Mesh linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and trousers with braces in soft organic cotton. Bodysuit in ribbed jersey with a button placket and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers in woven fabric with braces that button at the front and elastication at the back of the waist and at the hems.
Scarf in patterned satin. Size 90x90 cm.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Lined, underwired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.

Calf-length dress in softly draping, lightly crêped satin with a boat neck and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt and a flared, pleated skirt. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Straight-cut V-neck top in a linen weave with narrow shoulder straps.
Metal chain bracelet decorated with round pendants and plastic beads. Adjustable length 18-23 cm.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a fleece-lined stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener and elastication on the inside of the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.

Long shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons at the top, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Detachable tie belt under the bust and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Relaxed-fit top in soft velour with a round neck and short sleeves.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned thermal fleece with press-studs down the front that continue down one leg.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn either as a jacket or as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, concealed zip down the front and side pockets. Unlined. Regular Fit. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Short, boxy-style coat in twill with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a pleat at the back for added width. Large patch front pockets and long, wide raglan sleeves with a tab and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with patch front pockets, one with a concealed zip and press-stud, and back pockets. Slim legs that flare at the hem with creases.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Handbag accessory with a metal chain and carabiner hook, and an imitation leather pendant in the shape of a backpack. The backpack has a zip at the top, faux fur pompom and small, zipped outer compartment. Size approx. 3x7x9 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Shirt in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pockets, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Soft, non-wired nursing bras in a bralette style with opening, lace-covered cups with a jersey lining and space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.
Cropped top in soft cotton jersey with concealed elastication at the front of the top.

Tuxedo trousers in a wool weave with satin stripes down the sides of the legs. Concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Blouse in an airy weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening with concealed buttons at the front. Gathered yoke at the back, gathers on the shoulders, long sleeves with narrow, frill-trimmed, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Off-the-shoulder dress in a crinkled viscose weave with elastication at the top and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounced hem. Airy jersey underskirt.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend.
Fitted maxi dress in a rib-knit cotton blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and gentle flare to the hem. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Skirt in a double layer of tulle with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Top in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a small stand-up collar with gathers at the back of the neck.

Dress in woven fabric with a unique nursing feature, a collar, and long sleeves with a tab and button. Seam at the waist and side pockets. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Narrow belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2 cm.

Short, off-the-shoulder chiffon dress with narrow ties, a flounce and elastication at the top. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, long, sheer sleeves with smocking and a flounce at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in a linen and cotton blend in a relaxed fit with and elasticated drawstring waist and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and jersey-lined drawstring hood with a ribbed edge. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with a concealed zip at the back, bell-shaped panels at the sides of the hem and a short slit at the front. Short sleeves with gathers for a draped effect. Partly lined.
Calf-length trousers in soft, ribbed viscose jersey. High waist with covered elastication and straight, wide legs.

Shirt in checked, lightweight cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved nightshirt in a soft cotton weave with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft cotton knit with an intarsia-knit motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Straight-cut top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
T-shirt in soft, patterned slub cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Metal watch with a narrow adjustable strap with a metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 1 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch approx. 2.7 cm.
Soft fleece jacket designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Unlined.
Long-sleeved T-shirt in waffled cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.
Short top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck front and back, long sleeves and a gathered seam with narrow elastication down the front.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, double, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, a regular waist, side pockets and tapered legs.

Straight-cut blouse in a cotton weave with hole-embroidered sections at the front and down the sleeves. Small stand-up collar, a V-neck and embroidered appliqués at the front. Dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a gathered yoke at the back.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Straight-cut blouse in airy weave with covered buttons down the back, gathers at the shoulders and short balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication. Unlined.
Large bucket bag in imitation leather with a handle, detachable shoulder strap and drawstring at the top. Unlined. Size approx. 15x29.5x31.5 cm.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft mohair blend with a turtleneck, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a fine, airy knit containing glittery threads with a round neck, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Reversible shopper with a grained imitation leather outside, imitation suede inside and two handles at the top. Unlined. Size 14x28x38 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with short sleeves and a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Set with a bodysuit, trousers and hat in soft, organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with sewn-on ears.
Shaping briefs in microfibre and lace with a high waist and half-string back. Sculpting effect on the waist, bum and hips.
Blouse in crisp cotton poplin. Open back with ties at the back of the neck and down the back. Round neckline with gathers at the front and short, elasticated puff sleeves. Unlined.
Long-sleeved shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
